metadata.title: CVE-2022-2327 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: io_uring use work_flags to determine which identity need to grab from thecalling process to make sure it is consistent with the calling process whenexecuting IORING_OP. Some operations are missing some types, which can leadto incorrect reference counts which can then lead to a double free. Werecommend upgrading the kernel past commitdf3f3bb5059d20ef094d6b2f0256c4bf4127a859

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
